Package org.easybatch.core.dispatcher

This package contains built-in implementations of the AbstractRecordDispatcher class.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Predicate
    Predicates are used to check if a record matches a criteria so that it is dispatched to the correct queue.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractRecordDispatcher
    Base class for record dispatchers.
    BroadcastRecordDispatcher
    A record dispatcher that broadcasts input records to a list of queues.
    ContentBasedRecordDispatcher
    A record dispatcher that dispatches records to a list of queues based on their content.
    ContentBasedRecordDispatcherBuilder
    Builder for ContentBasedRecordDispatcher.
    DefaultPredicate
    A default predicate used to put records in the default queue when building a ContentBasedRecordDispatcher.
    PoisonRecordBroadcaster
    A utility job event listener that broadcasts a PoisonRecord record at the end of the job using a delegate record dispatcher.
    RandomRecordDispatcher
    A record dispatcher that dispatches records randomly to a list of queues.
    RoundRobinRecordDispatcher
    A record dispatcher that dispatches records to a list of queues in round-robin fashion.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    RecordDispatchingException
    Exception thrown when an error occurs during record mapping.

Package org.easybatch.core.dispatcher Description

This package contains built-in implementations of the AbstractRecordDispatcher class.
